stimulusHtml: Which of the following can be used to replace  /* missing initialization */  so that the code segment prints   0 1 4 6 7 ?

features.html:
Consider the following method.

 

public static void find(String[] words, int s, int i) 
{ 
   if (i != words.length) 
   { 
      if (i == 0 || !(words[s].equals(words[i]))) 
      { 
         s = i; 
         System.out.print(s + " "); 
      }             
      find(words, s, i + 1); 
   } 
}

 

The following code segment appears in a method in the same class as  find.

 

String[] furniture = /* missing initialization */ ;
find(furniture, 0, 0);
